mapper.select: SELECT bi.id AS basket_item_id, bi.quantity, i.id AS item_id, i.name as item_name, i.price, i.discount, i.is_green, i.thumbnail_image, b.name AS brand_name FROM shopping_basket sb JOIN basket_item bi ON sb.id = bi.shopping_basket_id JOIN item i ON bi.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN brand b ON i.brand_id = b.id WHERE sb.member_id = #{memberId}
